name: flavor-scss
description: Flavor SCSS, bourbon.io based mixins & helpers

scripts.git-prepare: changelog && echo 'CHANGELOD.md file built' && npm run readme && npm run docs
scripts.docs: sassdoc scss -d docs && echo 'docs built' || echo 'docs building error'
scripts.readme: pkg-2-readme package.json > README.md -t "./pkg-2-readme.template.md" && echo 'README.md file built' || echo 'README.md building error'
scripts.test: sass-lint -c scss-lint.yml -v -q && echo 'scss lint ok' || echo 'scss lint error'

author: Black Mirror
